resources.author: michael_j_felock
resources.post: Its been awhile since I’ve been here and still……………………no definitive explanation of how the image was created………why? because I stated that I understood how it occurred and received pretty much no interest in what I had to say. Am I angry? disappointed? No…..just stating that, were I to come back to this site in a 100 years there still would not be an explanation as the second I first posted here the explanations became a fait accompli
